medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute worsening of right upper quadrant abdominal pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms have been present for several months, associated with 20 lb weight loss, nausea, and intermittent orange urine. Pain exacerbated by eating. Patient reports last alcohol consumption was 3 days ago.
medical_history.family_history: Grandmother, aunt, and cousin all had unspecified conditions in the past. No history of hypertension, hyperlipidemia, or cancer in the family.
medical_history.social_history: Patient has a history of heavy alcohol consumption, especially during psychosocial stressors such as financial and marital difficulties.
